header-quote: In the lingo this imaginary place is known as the Metaverse.
feature-metaverse-world-subtitle: Curate a virtual experience that's as unique as your brand, and allows you to connect and engage with what matters most — people.
feature-virtual-shop-subtitle: Build a virtual store that seeks to enhance the customer experience offered by your typical ecommerce sites while elevating your Club's ability to create a highly engaging & nurturing Channel that is strategicaly designed to increase conversion
feature-interactive-museum-subtitle: Present and share your products and your history in an immersive, global showroom. Let customers explore product details in 3D, or walk them through personally.
feature-media-center-subtitle: Have a central Hub for all visitors that displays engaging content, regularly updated news & integrates with your brands social media. Direct ability to update and showcase your club's best and most recently trending photos/videos.
feature-analytycs-dashboard-subtitle: Equipped with analytics dashboards designed to enable your marketing teams to track ROI, impressions & community engagement. Can be integrated with marketing automation software.
feature-mini-games-subtitle: Kammamuri unique mini-games built specifically for your audience base. Exceptional for building a competitive scene that offers long term user engagement on the metaverse.
get-in-touch-paragraph: Feel free to contact us for any questions. We will be happy to hear from you!
half-carousel-paragraph:
Web-based persistent multiuser 3D environment
Showroom, event & workshop spaces
Virtual Reality & Gaming Access
Custom designed 3D environment (design & size)
Custom corporate avatar design and animations
Avatar, orbit and website navigation
Schedule events, panels and live streams
Manage content
Video, audio & text chat
3D product presentation
